name: LIVE LONG
description:
LIVE LONG IS A SURVIVING GAME WHERE PLAYER HAVE TO TAKE CARE THE AREA FROM THE ZOMBIE ATTACK.

PLAYER HAVE TO SAVE THE AREA FROM THE SPAWNING ZOMBIE ATTACK

  • IT IS A FPS TYPE OF GAME.
  • IT IS SHOOTING TYPE GAME.
  • PLAYER HAVE TO KILL THE ZOMBIES .
  • EACH 10 SEC ZOMBIE WILL RE-SPAWN.
  • THE GAME WILL NOT END UNTIL THE PLAYER DIES.
  • GUN USED IS AK-47.
